Portal 2 is probably one of my favorite games ever. It's got good characters, good lore, good sound design (I suggest using headphones), AMAZING dialog, and is just overall a fun time. And if you don't like the single player or multiplayer levels, make one yourself! It's a very good time, and if on sale, the price is incredibly low!

Portal 2.....What to say? Oh I know! It's great, it's perfect. If you like puzzle games and humor than get this game. Now, because this takes portal's humor and times it by ten. It's a game that has a person who tells jokes plays Wheatly. That's very rare. Also everybody talks about Pickle Rick but what about Potato GlaDoS? This game is funny, and the puzzles make you think not solve them in a second and makes you check where you are to solve it. Even if this game is 10 years old it's still great. The humor doesn't have anything that relates to the current year. It's timeless. Even though the graphics are dated they mostly hold up. And when it ended I was sad. Because I wanted more. Not that the ending is bad. It's great but I wanted to play this game forever. With the jokes and everything it leaves you saying "That was a great game" With the Co-op and it allows you to build your own testing room. You don't need to play Portal to really catch the story. It's recommended to play portal, but you pick up the story. Also if you have a VR set you should play Half-Life: Alex. It's nice to see valve give another game for the half life. Anyways. Portal 2 is great. It's fan base is miles away from COD fan base less 12 year old's and more nice people who try to help you in the Co-op. So lastly, it's great. I wish I could just erase my memory of the story and play it back, because it's that good. I want to replay this game with a wiped memory and relive it. Laugh at the jokes for the first time. Complete the first level. So please. Play this game! Please!
